titleStmt.title: The history of His sacred Majesty Charles the II, King of England, Scotland, France & Ireland, defender of the faith &c. begun from the murder of his royall father of happy memory & continued to this present year, 1660 / by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Dauncey, John, fl. 1663.
Davies, James.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to John Dauncey.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
